original_text: And the Lord said unto David my father, Whereas it was in thine heart to build an house unto my name, thou didst well that it was in thine heart.
korean_text: 여호와께서 내 아버지 다윗에게 이르시되 네가 내 이름을 위하여 성전을 건축할 마음이 있으니 이 마음이 네게 있는 것이 좋도다

sentences.original_text: And the Lord said unto David my father
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 주께서 나의 아버지 다윗에게 말씀하시기를

sentences.original_text: Whereas it was in thine heart
to build an house unto my name
sentences.korean_translation: 내 이름을 위해 집을 짓고자 하였으니

sentences.original_text: that it was in thine heart
